claims.object: A measure of resistance to torsional deformation

surface_layer.definition: A geometric property of a cross-section related to its resistance to twisting.

deep_layer.mechanism: Represents the resistance of a cross-section to twisting forces.
deep_layer.origin: Calculated from the geometry of the cross-section.

examples: 0.136 in^3 for a 1-inch nominal diameter schedule 40 steel tube

citations: ASTM Steel Tube Pipe Section Properties - Engineers Edge
